=== Declaration ===
<tt>#include <pgm/http.h></tt>

<tt>int '''pgm_http_shutdown''' (void);</tt>

=== Purpose ===
Stop and destroy a running HTTP interface.

=== Return Value ===
On success, 0 is returned.
